sentence.english: She isn't carrying her bag today because it's raining.
sentence.spanish: Ella no lleva su bolso hoy porque está lloviendo.

sentence.english: Are you using your bank card for this purchase?
sentence.spanish: ¿Usas tu tarjeta bancaria para esta compra?

sentence.english: He was checking the calendar for his appointments yesterday.
sentence.spanish: Él revisaba el calendario para sus citas ayer.

sentence.english: I'm not bringing my charger to the office today.
sentence.spanish: No llevo mi cargador a la oficina hoy.

sentence.english: Were they collecting foreign coins during their travels?
sentence.spanish: ¿Coleccionaban monedas extranjeras durante sus viajes?

sentence.english: She is writing in her diary every evening.
sentence.spanish: Ella escribe en su agenda cada tarde.

sentence.english: He doesn't use a dictionary for simple words.
sentence.spanish: Él no usa un diccionario para palabras simples.

sentence.english: Are they listening to music with their earphones?
sentence.spanish: ¿Escuchan música con sus auriculares?

sentence.english: She wasn't organizing her files properly last week.
sentence.spanish: Ella no organizaba sus carpetas adecuadamente la semana pasada.

sentence.english: He is cleaning his glasses before reading.
sentence.spanish: Él está limpiando sus gafas antes de leer.

sentence.english: Do you wear headphones when you work?
sentence.spanish: ¿Llevas auriculares cuando trabajas?

sentence.english: They weren't carrying their identity cards to the event.
sentence.spanish: Ellos no llevaban sus documentos de identidad al evento.

sentence.english: She lost her keys last Monday morning.
sentence.spanish: Ella perdió sus llaves el lunes por la mañana.

sentence.english: Are you turning on the lamp for more light?
sentence.spanish: ¿Enciendes la lámpara para más luz?

sentence.english: He isn't using his laptop for gaming.
sentence.spanish: Él no usa su portátil para jugar.

sentence.english: Were they reading fashion magazines at the salon?
sentence.spanish: ¿Leían revistas de moda en el salón?

sentence.english: She is wearing a mask on public transport.
sentence.spanish: Ella lleva puesta una mascarilla en el transporte público.

sentence.english: Do you read the newspaper every morning?
sentence.spanish: ¿Lees el periódico cada mañana?

sentence.english: He wasn't writing in his notebook during the lecture.
sentence.spanish: Él no escribía en su cuaderno durante la conferencia.

sentence.english: Are they using blue pens for their assignments?
sentence.spanish: ¿Usan bolígrafos azules para sus tareas?

sentence.english: She is sharpening her pencils before the exam.
sentence.spanish: Ella está sacando punta a sus lápices antes del examen.

sentence.english: He doesn't answer his phone during meetings.
sentence.spanish: Él no contesta su teléfono durante las reuniones.

sentence.english: Were you taking photos at the concert last night?
sentence.spanish: ¿Sacabas fotos en el concierto anoche?

sentence.english: I'm not printing on recycled paper for this document.
sentence.spanish: No imprimo en papel reciclado para este documento.

sentence.english: She left her purse at the restaurant yesterday.
sentence.spanish: Ella dejó su monedero en el restaurante ayer.

sentence.english: Are you using the scissors for your art project?
sentence.spanish: ¿Usas las tijeras para tu proyecto de arte?

sentence.english: He always wears his sunglasses when driving.
sentence.spanish: Él siempre lleva sus gafas de sol cuando conduce.

sentence.english: They weren't using their tablets for online classes.
sentence.spanish: Ellos no usaban sus tabletas para clases online.

sentence.english: Is she buying tickets for the cinema tonight?
sentence.spanish: ¿Compra billetes para el cine esta noche?

sentence.english: He doesn't carry tissues in his pocket.
sentence.spanish: Él no lleva pañuelos en su bolsillo.

sentence.english: Were they taking their umbrellas despite the sunny forecast?
sentence.spanish: ¿Llevaban sus paraguas a pesar del pronóstico soleado?

sentence.english: She is checking her wallet for her bank card.
sentence.spanish: Ella está revisando su cartera para buscar su tarjeta bancaria.

sentence.english: Do you wear a watch every day?
sentence.spanish: ¿Llevas reloj todos los días?
